sentences.english: Another problem for returning migrants is that they may not have much to return to.
sentences.chinese: 另一个返国的移民问题是，他们可能没有多少回。

sentences.english: The delegation will be home next week.
He returned to China in 1917 and taught as a professor in Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 民国六年返国，任北京大学教授。

sentences.english: You also need to demonstrate that you plan to return home.
sentences.chinese: 您还必须表明您有计划返国。

sentences.english: And helping to create an environment where we get jobs back in our country.
sentences.chinese: 并且帮助创造一种能在返国后找到工作的环境。

sentences.english: After his return, Mr. Ramos-Horta urged the remaining rebels to turn themselves in to face trial.
sentences.chinese: 奥尔塔总统返国之后呼吁在逃叛军自首，面对审判。

definition: to go home (to one's native country)/to return from abroad
accompanied by one's dependents/encumbered by wife and children
ordained or appointed to a post/to benefit from counsel
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)
to withdraw troops from the front/to return in triumph
to bundle up (one's possessions for a journey)
to return/to go back/to come back
